outline.title: Sakshi Platform
outline.summary: Title slide introducing Sakshi as a conscious living platform that makes sustainability accessible and affordable for all Indians.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: The Sustainability Gap is Widening
outline.summary: Despite growing awareness, sustainable living remains inaccessible due to high costs. 68% of Indians want to live sustainably but cite cost as barrier. ₹92,000 crores of usable goods wasted annually.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: A Comprehensive Conscious Living Ecosystem
outline.summary: Integrated platform with Sakshi Cafe (triple pricing), thrift marketplace, repair cafe, swap events, upcycle studio, and Seva token economy creating multiple pathways to sustainable living.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: ₹2.4 Trillion Market Growing at 23% CAGR
outline.summary: Massive market opportunity across organic food (₹1.2T), secondhand goods (₹800B), and wellness (₹400B). Target audience of 150M urban millennials and health-conscious consumers.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Multiple Revenue Streams, Sustainable Margins
outline.summary: Diversified revenue from cafe sales (60%), marketplace commissions (20%), subscriptions (8%), classes (7%), and franchises (5%). Unit economics showing 15% profit margin per location.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Industry-First Pricing Model Ensuring Universal Access
outline.summary: Revolutionary triple pricing system with Community/Fair/Supporter tiers. Self-regulating, financially sustainable model where supporter tier subsidizes community access. Everyone eats with dignity.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Gamifying Conscious Living Through Community Currency
outline.summary: Seva token economy rewards participation through volunteering, donations, and engagement. Users redeem tokens for meals, items, and classes. 50,000 tokens circulated monthly worth ₹5 lakhs.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Built for Scale with Modern Architecture
outline.summary: Production-ready platform with 70+ database tables, 100+ API endpoints, AI-powered recommendations, real-time inventory, multi-vendor marketplace. Cloud-native supporting 100,000+ concurrent users.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Rapid Development, Ready for Launch
outline.summary: Complete platform built (109 files, 57,000+ lines). All systems operational including cafe, marketplace, operations, AI features. Ready for beta launch December 2025 with 500+ pre-launch signups.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Measuring Success Beyond Revenue
outline.summary: Year 1 targets: 50,000 meals served, 10,000 items diverted from landfills, 5,000 people accessing community pricing, 100 women employed, 30% reduction in food waste vs industry.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: What Makes Sakshi Unique
outline.summary: Differentiated through triple pricing, Seva tokens, 100% plant-based focus, community-owned model, integrated ecosystem. Network effects create sustainable moat as platform grows.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Phased Expansion Across India
outline.summary: Phase 1: Bangalore launch with 2 cafes. Phase 2: Expand to 8 locations. Phase 3: Multi-city expansion to 25 locations. Marketing through social media, events, influencers, and word-of-mouth.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: ₹5 Crores Seed Round to Launch and Scale
outline.summary: Funding allocation: Cafe setup (40%), technology (20%), marketing (20%), working capital (15%), legal (5%). Milestones: 2 cafes, 10,000 users, 100 vendors, ₹80L monthly revenue.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Building India's Largest Conscious Living Movement
outline.summary: 3-year vision: 100 locations, 1M users, ₹100Cr revenue. 10-year vision: 1,000 locations, 10M users, ₹1,000Cr revenue. Mission: Make sustainable living accessible, affordable, and aspirational for every Indian.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed
